name: norrin
text: Oh, good. Until I read that, I thought he was down for the JO time in the bathroom as well, which disturbed me.

name: tellumo
text: He knows that he will be just as satisfied with one minute as he would with five (or at least only marginally less), and that Lyle will still be able to make use of the four spare minutes. The Philippe of this strip may well have read this book .

name: dorko_suavo
text: He knows,and he's very efficient with his time.

name: turnabout
text: the strip could have taken a real turn for the furry here. glad it didn't.

name: mira
text: furry or faux-furry? I, for one, am somewhat intrigued by the idea of teddy bears having sex. But I will be the first to question my taste.

text: That's fine, so long as neither of the teddy bears is you .

text: No kidding. That didn't last long. I guess there was danger of entering Calvin and Hobbes territory there.

name: i_love_kate
text: They're still all toys. The cats are real animals, as are the squirrels, but those four are definitely plush. But it doesn't stop them having a damned good time .

text: Quite possibly the only strip where Cornelius is horny and vocal about it.

name: em2
text: These days, he would subtitle a movie.

name: stuart
text: Mr. Bear is so out of later established character here

name: petestart
text:
2.9 is not a fair reflection of this strip. A cursory glance of the comments on it suggest that Phillipe is out of character in his apparent sexual deviancy.

The Ultra-Peanut saga that follows later disproves that.

I think the best lesson we can learn from this strip is Lyle's inherent degeneracy, as well as that of the early, non-feline cast.

name: coldfrog
text: And that Lyle looks fatter with no shirt.
